transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, good afternoon sir, Vineet baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Sir us din humari baat nahi complete ho paayi thi na, us din aap thoda sa busy the.
Customer: Haan lekin mai toh bahar tha abhi bhi bahar hu, bataiye kuch urgent hai kya?
Executive: Ji ji sir urgent hai, maine bataya tha ki aapko not satisfied ka ek concern aaya tha ki Shruti se aapki baat hui thi, but aap usme
Customer: Haan maine unko recording bhej di hai maine, mai mai kya bataya, mere ko kuch leads mat do bas mere ko faltu ke phone aana band kar do bas, mere ko kuch mai aapko kuch pareshan nahi karunga.
Executive: Mai kya keh raha hu, hum logo ne already escalate kar diya hai, matlab aisa nahi hai ki mai aapka feedback nahi le raha hu, aapne kaha ki mere ko woh galat calls aa rahe hai woh nahi aana chahiye.
Customer: Mere ko kuch nahi chahiye. Aur kya hota hai sir dekhiye, mai sare kaam chhod ke baithta hu aur yeh log aake humko sab bechte ho toh kya batao aapko, agar gine chune char phone aate hai charo me se teen phone agar aise hai toh kaise karenge batao.
Executive: Kitna call aayi sir is mahine me, matlab kitni call aisi rahi hogi jo kaam ki nahi thi?
Customer: Sabhi kaam ki jo call aati hai sabhi bekar kaam ki hoti hai.
Executive: Sir ek cheez bataiye matlab aap meri meri taraf se samjhiye jaise ki isne millet play se millet cookies Google pe search kiya hoga, hai na, isko Malu food ke upar number one pe dikh raha hai, ab usme aise bande ki bhi dekho mai pehle ek baar mai bolta hu usko usme aise bande ki bhi call aa sakti hai jisko requirement nahi hai, hai na aur aise ki bhi aa sakti hai jisko requirement hai, ab dekho aisa toh koi kisi bhi company me aisa filter nahi hoga ki hum log pehle us call ko verify kare, kyuki kya hai call [inaudible] LinkedIn me hai LinkedIn LinkedIn me hai LinkedIn me hai hum kar rahe hai LinkedIn use.
Customer: Sir LinkedIn me aap LinkedIn me hai LinkedIn me kitni LinkedIn me hai filter hai.
Customer: Bas ek ek 10 aati hai 10 ki 10, 10 aati hai 10 ka 10 solid hota hai.
Executive: Sir mere ko nahi lagta ki koi search karega aur woh pehle [inaudible]
Customer: Kyuki udhar ka filter kaisa hai bina [inaudible]
Customer: Bina GST ka sir usme system hi aisa humne kar rakha hai, bina GST purchase manager aur employee ID, yeh teen dalne ke baad hi form form fill up me dal dete hai employee ID, GST number company aur department purchase agar purchase department raha aur LinkedIn ka profile attach hua toh hi mere ko lead milta hai woh, haan.
Executive: Kal aapko ek call aayi thi jisme aapki 211 second baat hui 11:51 pe, kaisi call thi sir woh matlab kaisa buyer tha?
Customer: Hmm dekhna padega mere ko kal.
Executive: Haan kal call aayi thi aapko, aap hi se baat hui hai, 222 tha last me.
Customer: Kitne baje?
Executive: Yeh 11:51 pe.
Customer: Kal, ji Mumbai se aayi. 11 bajke Mumbai se haan.
Executive: Isme yeh toh baat bhi hua baat bhi hua, yeh gharelu aap khud baat kar lo usse ki kaunse purpose ke liye chahiye tumko, industrial purpose ke liye chahiye domestic.
Customer: Nahi mai puch raha hu khali sir agar theek nahi lagi toh mai feedback de raha hu khali ek do calls ka taki mai team ko bhi feedback de saku.
Executive: Dekho sir different call hai aap khud baat kar lo bande se mai aapko number dalta hu aur aap puch lo ki aapko requirement [inaudible].
Customer: Nahi thi matlab woh woh ghar ke liye dekh raha tha, maine bola chalo chalo budha aadmi hai, bola mere ko bahar nahi ja sakta, maine bola sir de denge aapko, mana nahi kiya maine.
Executive: Yeh toh aapke yeh toh aapke idhar ka near by ka hi hai Mumbai ka hi hai toh isme bhi sir kaam nahi kar sakte matlab.
Customer: Kaam kar sakte hai sir lekin uske ghar me khane usko Amazon se nahi mangana hai, usko ghar me 15 kilo ki, chalo de denge bola mai de diya, haan woh bhi de uska dikkat nahi hai sir dekho customer customer hota hai humare liye, bas woh company nahi hai personal use ke liye le raha hai.
Executive: Ji. Aur ek Maharashtra Maharashtra Goa se aayi thi ek call 13 tarikh ko 554 tha last me number.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute.
Executive: Maharashtra se bhi seconds baat hui.
Customer: Goa Goa se.
Executive: Haan 554 tha last me number me.
Customer: Nahi kab aayi thi date date bataiye.
Executive: Yeh 13 November ko aayi thi.
Customer: SD foods Kolhapur, nahi, jo aayi thi na sir haan, woh 13 November ko last me kya tha bol rahe?
Executive: 55 554.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan, aap baat kar lo usse, woh aata bechna chah raha tha.
Executive: Mai khali aapse puch raha hu matlab mai kuch kuch calls jinpe aapki lambi calls toh bahut saari dikh rahi hai, toh jinpe aap thodi zyada baat hui hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan, toh mai haan toh mai yeh yeh jo hai na banda aap jo bol rahe hai yeh mujhe aata bechna chah raha tha.
Executive: Achha achha.
Customer: Hmm aap baat kar lo mai jhoot nahi bolunga.
Executive: Are sir ek Andhra Pradesh se call aayi thi jispe aapki baat 6 minute hui hai, kaafi der baat hui hai.
Customer: Number bataiye date bataiye, 9 November ko isse itni der baat hui hai toh kaisa tha call, last me 567 hai.
Executive: 9 November ko call aayi hai 1:22 pe dopahar me.
Customer: Haan ek minute haan, Bhargavi haan haan, yeh haan yeh temple maang rahe the, ho gayi baat inse.
Executive: Haan inse kaafi lambi baat hui hai toh phir inse ek se do.
Customer: Haan lambi hui isliye kyuki negotiation kar rahe the abhi.
Executive: Ek aapko sir thodi na miss calls bhi aayi hui hai is mahine dekho 782 number se aapko miss call aayi thi, aapne usko call back nahi kiya hai, yeh MP Chhattisgarh se, isko sir call back kar lijiyega ek baar.
Customer: Achha theek hai. Kya pata sir isse bhi kuch requirement aaye 782 hai last me, theek hai number ke, okay, MP Chhattisgarh se aayi hai aur do teen is is bande ne aapko do baar call kiya hai usi din, matlab ek din kiya tha aapko 6 November ko 3 baje, ek baar usne kiya tha 3:30 baje ke aas pass.
Executive: Uska 6 November ko Chhattisgarh se.
Executive: Sir isme toh kaafi teen baar aapko call kiya hai is bande ne, toh kya pata sir requirement achhi ho ek baar puchna agar itna call kar raha hai toh.
Customer: Achha Jai Shree haan Sonipat Haryana hai woh sir woh Chhattisgarh nahi hai.
Executive: Haan 782 hai last me.
Customer: Haan, number kya hai last me? Haan haan haan.
Executive: Yeh log market explore market explore kar raha hai abhi tak woh unka matlab research chal rahe bol rahe the.
Executive: Ek bada company hai KF ingredients.
Customer: Achha, sir dekho matlab aisa nahi hai ki requirement nahi hai, call achhi nahi aa rahi, mai kya keh raha hu na, maine kaha tha by time jaise jaise time jayega aise aise aapka flow bhi achha hoga, dekho abhi aapko mahine me mahine me ek do calls aa rahi hai, mera kaam kya hai aapko abhi list karna, aap number one pe list ho gaye ho but jo aap chah rahe ho na traffic woh by time aayega.
Customer: Bilkul sir mai woh nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi woh by time aayega sir matlab hum log bahut zyada kya keh sakte hai ki immediate response ki expectation rakh rahe hai, mai manta hu ki aapne service di hai almost humara ek mahina ho gaya service ko live kiye hue, but baat uska nahi hai sir mai kya bol raha hu agar mera mera honestly usage hai leads har consume karna ho raha hai mere end se, mai chahunga aapka algorithm bhi usi tarah kaam kare.
Executive: Bilkul karega sir mai matlab yeh aapko surety de raha hu ki matlab agar humare end se 1% ki bhi gunjaish hai na woh nahi rahegi, maine uske liye Shruti ne kal hi uske liye ticket open kar diya tha, jo humare HOD hai kal mai available nahi tha, hai na, toh jo humare HOD hai unse baat lekin Shruti ne already escalate kar diya hai hum log kaam kar rahe hai and we will make sure sir by by end of this month yeh resolve bhi ho jaye.
Customer: Chalega chalega sir.
Executive: Aap thoda sa time humko provide karo sir, mere hisab se aapko kiya tha.
Customer: Karenge kuch nahi abhi abhi abhi kuch nahi karenge hum, kuch clear nahi denge aapko.
Executive: Abhi abhi mai abhi mai na aapko ek concern hai aapka woh close kar raha hu, aapko mail pe sir ek feedback aayega, please usko satisfied mark kijiyega usse Shruti ki bhi rating kharab hoti hai agar not satisfied karte aur meri bhi, hai na agar aapko satisfaction nahi hota hai thode time baad toh aap free ho is cheez ke liye aap usko baar baar not satisfied kar sakte ho.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Theek hai nahi nahi kar dete hai theek hai sir kar dete hai koi baat nahi.
Executive: Mai karta hu sir aapko aayega please usko satisfied kijiyega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to stop receiving irrelevant calls.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.



Resolution:

- Escalated the issue to the relevant team.

- Assured that the issue will be resolved.

- Requested to mark the feedback as satisfied.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will close the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, spam calls, feedback, resolution
